title: FastMCP Client
description: [FastMCP](https://gofastmcp.com/) is a higher-level MCP framework that bills itself as "The fast, Pythonic way to build MCP servers and clients." It supports additional capabilities on top of the MCP specification like [Tool Transformation](https://gofastmcp.com/patterns/tool-transformation), [OAuth](https://gofastmcp.com/clients/auth/oauth), and more.
